title: Encore: 'The Hat, The Horn, And The Purse' | feat. Bobby Moynihan
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In this encore, we revisit an Italian folktale starring Bobby Moynihan ("Duck Tales," "SNL") about a father who gives seemingly simple gifts to his three sons. But there is more to these family heirlooms than meets the eye.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Encore: 'The Hat, The Horn, And The Purse' | feat. Bobby Moynihan
itunes:summary: In this encore, we revisit an Italian folktale starring Bobby Moynihan ("Duck Tales," "SNL") about a father who gives seemingly simple gifts to his three sons. But there is more to these family heirlooms than meets the eye.

content:encoded: In this encore, we revisit an Italian folktale starring Bobby Moynihan ("Duck Tales," "SNL") about a father who gives seemingly simple gifts to his three sons. But there is more to these family heirlooms than meets the eye.
